refnamediv.refpurpose: Get or set custom DV timings for input or output

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: To set custom DV timings for the input or output, applications use the VIDIOC_S_DV_TIMINGS ioctl and to get the current custom timings, applications use the VIDIOC_G_DV_TIMINGS ioctl. The detailed timing information is filled in using the structure &v4l2-dv-timings;. These ioctls take a pointer to the &v4l2-dv-timings; structure as argument. If the ioctl is not supported or the timing values are not correct, the driver returns &EINVAL;.

__u32 width Width of the active video in pixels
